help-file.title: "STICKS TO SNAKES"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of Spell: Generic
This spell causes the Druid to transform sticks into snakes to use against his victim. For most terrains, the Druid is able to find a random number of sticks. Additionally, any arrows in the inventory of the target are transformed into snakes.
